source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_SEQ_00<tab>Ponnixia is not impressed with the sneaky ones' latest scheme.
target: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_SEQ_00<tab>シルフの仮宿のポニシアは、冒険者に手伝ってほしいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_SEQ_01<tab>As Ponnixia tells it, malevolent sylphs are employing a skin-changing spell to disguise themselves as treasure caskets, leading many an inexperienced adventurer to his doom. Use the clearsight scalebombs she has furnished you with to put an end to their ruse.
target: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_SEQ_01<tab>シルフ領の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E906001 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E890201 /var>」を使い、現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2090901 /var>」を3体討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_SEQ_02<tab>Fearing further retribution, the malevolent sylphs have abandoned their charade. Inform Ponnixia that they will trouble your fellow walking ones no more.
target: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E906001 /var>に化けていた<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2090901 /var>を討伐した。シルフの仮宿の「ポニシア」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_SEQ_03<tab>Ponnixia is delighted to hear that you have foiled the sneaky ones' ruse. It would seem that your friendship has fostered in the sylphs a measure of affection for others of your kind.
target: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_SEQ_03<tab>ポニシアに報告した。冒険者の活躍によって、シルフ領で起きた事件は解決した。ポニシアは、この調子で悪い子シルフの変装をあばいていこうと意気込んでいた。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_TODO_00<tab>Throw clearsight scalebombs at the suspicious coffers and dispatch foes.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_TODO_00シルフ領のにを使い
を討伐

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_000<tab>These ones just found a walking one lying on the ground near the Sylphlands. Walking one was covered in blood.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_000シルフ領に足を踏み入れた冒険者や旅人が、大ケガをちて、
仮宿に運ばれることがあるのでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_001<tab>This one spoke with walking one. Walking one was attacked by coin-boxes in the Sylphlands, walking one said. “Coin-boxes?” this one thought.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_001ケガ人たちは、うわ言で「森の宝箱が……」って、
言っているらちいのでふっち。
むむむ……きっと「ハンニン」は、悪い子シルフでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_002<tab>This one thinks sneaky ones are using sneaky magic to trick adventuring ones. This one is tired of sneaky ones' tricks.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_002やつらは、「変化のおまぢない」で「宝箱」に化けて、
ヒトの目を引いて不意打ちすることで、
シルフ領に来るものを「ゲキタイ」しているのでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_100_003<tab>This one does not want to see any more walking ones hurt. Brave one must take these see-booms, show coin-boxes for the sneaky ones they are.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_100_003この「」を使って、
「宝箱」に化けたやつらをあばいて、やっつけるでふっち！
この爆弾は、わたぴの作ったトッテオキなのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_005<tab>This one does not want to see any more walking ones hurt. Brave one must take these see-booms, show coin-boxes for the sneaky ones they are.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_005「」を使って、
「宝箱」に化けた悪い子シルフの正体をあばいたら、
やっつけてほしいでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_006<tab>Kill three sneaky ones, and those ones will not bother walking ones anymore. Those ones are weak of heart, this one knows.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_006悪い子シルフがビックリちて姿をあらわしたら、
やっつけてほしいでふっち！
3人も倒せば、ヤツらもきっと懲りるでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_SYLPHENEMY_000_018<tab>Meddling one will not leave this place alive!
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_SYLPHENEMY_000_019<tab>Bah! Walking one is no fun at all!
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_020<tab>Oh, thank you, brave one! Brave one's fellows will no longer be lured by sneaky ones into danger.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_020話はきいたでふっち。
やはり「ハンニン」は、悪い子シルフだったでふっち！
わたぴのカンはあたったでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_021<tab>Tee hee! Nothing gives this one greater pleasure than foiling those ones' silly schemes.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_PONNIXIA_000_021ふーっちっち！
この調子で、悪い子シルフの変装をドンドンあばいて、
やっつけていくでふっち！
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません
TEXT_BANSYL208_01274_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>見るからに怪しい宝箱がある……。
